attributes.action: Provide Supermarket Staff With COVID-19 Vaccine as one of the top priorities
attributes.additional_details: We risk our lives every day and yes the NHS are doing a wo fearful job and they deserve the vaccine first but I feel Supermarket Staff should also receive the vaccine as soon as possible
attributes.background: Supermarket staff put there lives at risk everyday to help overs and to keep the country fed and watered as a supermarket cleaner I feel that we should all receive the vaccine

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
